gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 109, Clippers 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Clippers, 109-95. Domantas Sabonis recorded 22 points, 20 rebounds and nine assists for the Kings, his 58th consecutive double-double and 71st on the season, while DeAaron Fox added 20 points and 7 assists in the victory. Russell Westbrook tallied 20 points, two rebounds and two assists for the Clippers in the losing effort. The Kings have won back-to-back games as they improve to 44-31 on the season, while the Clippers snap a three-game winning streak as they fall to 47-28.
